mapper.select: select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' order by sortno

select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' and menulevel=1 and appid=#{appid} and id in ( SELECT resid FROM portal_rolereslnk rl WHERE restype='MENU' AND roleid IN ( SELECT roleid FROM portal_roleauthcfg WHERE roleauthtype='DEP' AND refid IN (SELECT departmentid FROM org_employee WHERE id IN(SELECT COALESCE(employeeid,0) FROM portal_user WHERE id = #{userid})) UNION ALL SELECT roleid FROM portal_roleauthcfg WHERE roleauthtype='POS' AND refid IN (SELECT positionid FROM org_empposlnk WHERE employeeid IN(SELECT COALESCE(employeeid,0) FROM portal_user WHERE id = #{userid})) UNION ALL SELECT roleid FROM portal_roleauthcfg WHERE roleauthtype='DEPPOS' AND refid IN ( SELECT l.id FROM org_depposlnk l INNER JOIN org_department d ON l.departmentid=d.id AND d.delflag='0' INNER JOIN org_position p ON l.positionid=p.id AND p.delflag='0' INNER JOIN org_empposlnk el ON d.id = el.departmentid AND p.id=el.positionid INNER JOIN portal_user u ON el.employeeid=u.employeeid AND u.id=#{userid} ) ) ) order by sortno
select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' order by sortno limit #{begin}, #{rows}
select count(1) from portal_menu where delflag='0'
select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu WHERE delflag='0' and parentid = #{parentid} order by sortno

select count(1) from portal_menu where ID IN ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id, parentid, IF(FIND_IN_SET(parentid, @pids) > 0, @pids := CONCAT(@pids, ',', id), 0) pids FROM portal_menu, (SELECT @pids := #{parentid}) var WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parentid, @pids) > 0 ) tmp ) AND ID != #{parentid} and delflag='0'
